languages.text: {n}Ваших познаний хватает, чтобы разобраться, что именно случилось с машиной. Сбоящие проекторы, потусторонние звуки из глубин корпуса, тяжелая, давящая атмосфера вокруг — все это явно указывает на заражение мусорным кодом, одним из наиболее странных и пугающих порождений тех техножрецов, что отдали себя служению Губительным силам.{/n}

{n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваших познаний хватает, чтобы разобраться, что именно случилось с машиной. Сбоящие проекторы, потусторонние звуки из глубин корпуса, тяжелая, давящая атмосфера вокруг — все это явно указывает на заражение мусорным кодом, одним из наиболее странных и пугающих порождений тех техножрецов, что отдали себя служению Губительным силам.{/n}

Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

{n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你拥有足够的知识，可以明确地判断出这台机器发生了什么事情。斑驳的屏幕投影、机箱中传来的仿佛来自另一个世界的声音、房间里压抑的气氛——这一切情况都表明，这台机器遭到了废码的感染。那些投身毁灭之力的技术神甫创造出了无数造物，而废码属于尤为古怪、尤为恐怖的那种。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你拥有足够的知识，可以明确地判断出这台机器发生了什么事情。斑驳的屏幕投影、机箱中传来的仿佛来自另一个世界的声音、房间里压抑的气氛——这一切情况都表明，这台机器遭到了废码的感染。那些投身毁灭之力的技术祭司创造出了无数造物，而废码属于尤为古怪、尤为恐怖的那种。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sabes suficiente como para determinar qué le ha pasado a la máquina. Proyectores averiados, sonidos sobrenaturales en la carcasa, una atmósfera opresiva... todo apunta a que se trata de una infección de código de chatarra, una de las creaciones más extrañas y aterradoras de los tecnosacerdotes que sirven a los Poderes Ruinosos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sabes suficiente como para determinar qué le ha pasado a la máquina. Proyectores averiados, sonidos sobrenaturales en la carcasa, una atmósfera opresiva... todo apunta a que se trata de una infección de código de chatarra, una de las creaciones más extrañas y aterradoras de los tecnosacerdotes que sirven a los Poderes Ruinosos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは機械に何が起きたのかを正確に判断する知識を十分に持っている。不具合が多発するプロジェクター、機械の中から聞こえるこの世のものとは思えない音、部屋の重苦しい空気―どれもこれも破壊コードに感染した証拠だ。これは、禍つ神々にのめり込んだ技術司祭が生み出した不気味で恐ろしいもののひとつである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは機械に何が起きたのかを正確に判断する知識を十分に持っている。不具合が多発するプロジェクター、機械の中から聞こえるこの世のものとは思えない音、部屋の重苦しい空気―どれもこれも破壊コードに感染した証拠だ。これは、禍つ神々にのめり込んだ技術司祭が生み出した不気味で恐ろしいもののひとつである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weißt genug, um genau zu ermitteln, was mit dieser Maschine passiert ist. Fehlerhafte Projektoren, außerweltliche Geräusche aus dem Inneren des Gehäuses, eine bedrückende Atmosphäre im Raum – alles deutet auf eine Infektion mit Schadcode hin, eine merkwürdige und furchteinflößende Schöpfung der Techpriester, die den Mächten der Zerstörung verfallen sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weißt genug, um genau zu ermitteln, was mit dieser Maschine passiert ist. Fehlerhafte Projektoren, außerweltliche Geräusche aus dem Inneren des Gehäuses, eine bedrückende Atmosphäre im Raum – alles deutet auf eine Infektion mit Schadcode hin, eine merkwürdige und furchteinflößende Schöpfung der Techpriester, die den Mächten der Zerstörung verfallen sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos connaissances sont suffisantes pour vous permettre de déterminer ce qui est arrivé à la machine. Les projecteurs défectueux, les bruits étranges venant du boîtier, l'atmosphère oppressante qui règne dans la pièce... Tout indique qu'il s'agit d'une infection de l'anticode, l'une des créations les plus singulières et les plus effrayantes des technoprêtres dévoués aux Puissances de la Ruine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos connaissances sont suffisantes pour vous permettre de déterminer ce qui est arrivé à la machine. Les projecteurs défectueux, les bruits étranges venant du boîtier, l'atmosphère oppressante qui règne dans la pièce... Tout indique qu'il s'agit d'une infection de l'anticode, l'une des créations les plus singulières et les plus effrayantes des technoprêtres dévoués aux Puissances de la Ruine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Makineye ne olduğunu çözmeyi başarıyorsun. Arızalı projektörler, kasadan yükselen kâbusumsu sesler ve odanın basık atmosferi, tek bir şeye işaret ediyor: Hurda kodu enfeksiyonu. Bu, kendilerini Yıkıcı Güçler'e adamış Tekno Rahiplerin marifeti olan en esrarengiz ve korkunç yaratımlarındandır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know enough to determine exactly what happened to the machine. Glitchy projectors, otherworldly sounds from inside the case, an oppressive atmosphere in the room — everything points toward a scrap-code infection, one of the stranger and more frightening creations of the Tech-Priests who devote themselves to the Ruinous Powers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Makineye ne olduğunu çözmeyi başarıyorsun. Arızalı projektörler, kasadan yükselen kâbusumsu sesler ve odanın basık atmosferi tek bir şeye işaret ediyor: Hurda Kodu enfeksiyonu. Kendilerini Yıkıcı Güçler'e adayan Tekno Rahiplerin marifeti olan en esrarengiz ve korkunç eser bu.{/n}
